summary: This document outlines the Know Your Customer (KYC) details for various accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein and related entities. It includes information about account ownership, purposes, expected transactions, and the individuals involved in managing these accounts. This document provides detailed financial information regarding Jeffrey Epstein and several associated individuals, including their occupations, estimated net worth, and business relationships. It also outlines the structure and purpose of various legal entities linked to Epstein, such as trusts and LLCs, highlighting their investment activities and management. This document is a Know Your Customer (KYC) report for NES, LLC, detailing its business activities, ownership structure, and financial profile. It highlights the relationship between Jeffrey Epstein and the entity, confirming that all funds originate from Epstein and that he is the sole member of the LLC. The report also discusses the results of various due diligence checks performed on Epstein and associated individuals.

events.title: Account Opening Request
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein reached out to Stewart Oldfield to open a new account under the relationship with Deutsche Bank.

events.title: Establishment of The Haze Trust
events.description: The Haze Trust was established as a revocable trust with Jeffrey Epstein as the grantor, trustee, and beneficiary.

events.title: Establishment of Plan D, LLC
events.description: Plan D, LLC was registered as a single member LLC with Jeffrey Epstein as the sole member.

keyFacts: The document contains KYC details for accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein, including Nes LLC and The Haze Trust.
Darren K. Indyke is a key trustee and signatory for Epstein's accounts.
Stewart Oldfield is the relationship manager for these accounts.
The accounts are used for various purposes, including managing expenses related to Epstein's home and airplanes.
There are multiple accounts with significant expected inflows and outflows, indicating active financial management.
Jeffrey Epstein is a registered sex offender and financier with a significant financial history.
Epstein founded his own firm, J. Epstein & Co., and later changed its name to Financial Trust Company.
The Haze Trust and Plan D, LLC are two legal entities associated with Epstein, with specific purposes related to investment.
Darren K. Indyke is a trustee for Epstein's trust and is involved in his financial activities.
Several individuals mentioned are associated with Epstein's financial dealings, including accountants and investment advisors.
NES, LLC was created to manage expenses associated with one of Jeffrey Epstein's homes.
Jeffrey Epstein is the sole member of NES, LLC, and all funds come from him.
The estimated gross receipts for NES, LLC are $1,000,000 per annum.
The KYC report indicates no negative media or court cases for the individuals associated with the entity.
The report highlights that Jeffrey Epstein has a history of sex offenses, but these have been cleared.
